project.name: Open Commons for JSON
project.description:
[2019/04/09] - Release: 1.6.4 - Rebuild source directory structure.
[2019/03/29] - Release: 1.6.3.4 - Update + open.commons.core updated: 1.6.5
[2018/09/10] - Release: 1.6.3.3 - Update + open.commons.core updated: 1.4.17
[20148/04/30] - Release: 1.6.3.2 - Update + open.commons.core updated: 1.4.16
[2017/12/13] - Release: 1.6.3.1 - Update + open.commons.core updated: 1.4.10
[2017/11/29] - Release: 1.6.3 - Add + open.commons.json.util.JSONUtil.toMapStartWith(String) + open.commons.json.util.JSONUtil.toMapStartWithout(String)
[2017/11/03] - Release: 1.6.2.1 - Add + open.commons.json.util.JSONUtil.toMap(JSONObject): 내부 수정. HashMap -> FIFOMap
[2017/10/20] - Release: 1.6.2 - Add + open.commons.json.function.JSONFunction
[2017/09/22] - Release: 1.6.1.5 - Update + open-commons-core updated: 1.4.7
[2017/09/12] - Release: 1.6.1.4 - Update + open-commons-core updated: 1.4.6
[2017/09/11] - Release: 1.6.1.3 - Update + open-commons-core updated: 1.4.5
[2017/08/21] - Release: 1.6.1.2 - Update + open-commons-core updated: 1.4.2.1 -> 1.4.3.1
[2017/07/06] - Release: 1.6.1.1 - Update + open-commons-core updated: 1.4.2 -> 1.4.2.1
[2016/11/01] - Release: 1.6.1 - Update + open.commons.json.model.toOrderedJSONObject(JSONObject): 버그 수정
[2016/09/21] - Release: 1.6.0.1 - Update + open-commons-core updated: 1.4.0 -> 1.4.1 'properties ordering'
[2016/05/26] - Release: 1.6.0 - Update + set 'properties ordering'
[2016/05/04] - Release: 1.5.0 - Update + code of "org.codehaus.jettison.json": 1.3.7
[2015/12/23] - Release: 1.4.7 - Update + open-commons-core version: 1.4.0
[2015/12/23] - Release: 1.4.5.3 - Update + open-commons-core version: 1.3.3
[2015/07/23] - Update + open-commons-core version: 1.3.2
[2015/03/17] - Release: 1.4.5.2 - Update + open-commons-core version: 1.3.0
[2015/03/12] - Release: 1.4.5 - Update + open-commons-core version: 1.2.6
[2015/01/28] - Release: 1.4.4
[2015/01/13] - Release: 1.4.3.1 - Update + open-commons-core version: 1.2.2 <- 1.2.1
[2015/01/06] - Update + open-commons-core version: 1.2.1 <- 1.2.0
[2014/12/29] - Release + 1.4.3 - Add + JSONArrayFactory.toJSONArray(Collection<T>, Class<T>, GenericTypeVariable...) + JSONArrayFactory.toJSONArray(Collection<T>, Class<T>, List<Class<?>>)
+ JSONArrayFactory.toJSONArray(Collection<T>, Class<T>, Class<?>)
+ JSONArrayFactory.toJSONArray(Object, Class<T>, GenericTypeVariable...)
+ JSONArrayFactory.toJSONArray(Object, Class<T>, List<Class<?>>)
+ JSONArrayFactory.toJSONArray(Object, Class<T>, Class<?>)
[2014/11/25] - Release + 1.4.1 <- 1.3.1 - Update + Remove open.commons.json.model.AbstractJSONModel.hashCode() - Bug Fix + Rebirth open.commons.json.model.AbstractJSONModel.hashCode()
[2014/11/11] - Release + 1.3.1 <- 1.3.0.1
[2014/11/07] - Release + 1.3.0.1 <- 1.3.0 + open-commons-core version: 1.2.0 <- 1.1.3
[2014/11/04] - Release + 1.3.0 <- 1.2.2.1 - Bug Fix + open.commons.json.model.JSONMapper.unmarshall(String, Object, BuildConfig, Object ...)에서 Object가 null 인 경우 처리
[2014/10/17] - Release + 1.2.2.1 <- 1.2.2 + open-commons-core version: 1.1.3 <- 1.1.2
[2014/09/26] + open-commons-core version: 1.1.2 <- 1.1.1
[2014/09/17] + open-commons-core version: 1.1.1 <- 1.1.0
[2014/09/10] - Release: 1.2.2 - Change + open-commons-core version: 1.0.10 -> 1.1.0
[2014/07/29] - Release: 1.2.1 - Add + open.commons.jsonx.util
[2014/07/25] - Add + public static <T> T open.commons.json.util.JSONUtil.get(JSONObject, String, T) throws JSONException;
[2014/07/10] - Change + update open-commons-core version: 1.0.9 -> 1.0.10
[2014/07/07] - Release 1.0.10 - Patch + public static final <T extends Serializable & IJSONString> JSONArray open.commons.json.model.JSONArrayFactory.toJSONArray(Collection<T> values, Class<T> elemType) throws JSONException { return toJSONArray(values.toArray(), elemType); } 의 구현 부분을 return toJSONArray(values.toArray(new IJSONString[]{}), elemType);로 수정 [2014/06/19] - New + open.commons.json.model.exception.JSONMarshalledException + open.commons.json.model.exception.JSONUnmarshalledException
[2014/06/18] - Release 1.0.9 + Support variable json properties.
[2014/06/04] - Release 1.0.8
- Changes !!!!!!!!!!!!! + open.commons.core-1.0.8에 따른 side effects 처리
[2014/06/03] - New !!! + Support classes contains fields which are not a child of IJSONString.
[2014/05/30] - Hot !!! + License is changed!!! - before: COPYLEFT by 'Open Commons' & Park Jun-Hong All Rights Reserved when use for commercial purpose. - after:
[2014/05/08] - Changed !!! + open.commons.json.model.DefaultJSONModel.investigateField(Field, String) 를 open.commons.json.model.JSONMapper.investigateFiled(T, Field, String)로 이관. - open.commons.json.model.JSONArrayFactory 에 JSONArray 생성 메소드 추가
[2014/05/07] - open.commons.json.model.JSONArrayFactory + JSONArray 대신 String 를 파라미터로 받는 메소드들 추가.
[2014/05/02] - open-commons-core version up: 1.0.5 -> 1.0.6
# ....
1.5 - open.commons.json.model.JSONArrayFactory 추가.
1.4 - Set a modifier of AbstractJSONModel.hashCode() as 'final'.
